data.title: Rajan Khosa: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Rajan Khosa: Check out the list of all Rajan Khosa movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Rajan Khosa news on Times of India.
data.text:
Bollywood aur Patang

TNN / Mar 30, 2014, 22:30 (IST)

Kites are finding a renewed popularity in films ST points out a few films that have a varied depiction of kites.

Gattu goes to Dubai International Film Festival

TNN / Nov 08, 2012, 11:17 (IST)

Indian filmmaker Rajan Khosa’s 'Gattu' will be part of the Cinema for Children Programme at Dubai International Film Festival to be held in December this year

Neta-log said I should be an actor: Mohammad Samad

Mumbai Mirror / Jul 23, 2012, 09:57 (IST)

Mohammad Samad, better known as the street-kid kite runner Gattu, tells us about his dreams and living in a small town

Gattu

TNN / Jul 03, 2012, 13:50 (IST)

In a small town in central India, kids and adults are equally obsessed with kite-flying.

Gattu at the Berlin Film Festival

Mumbai Mirror / Mar 16, 2012, 12:10 (IST)

Gattu, a fun film about a child’s desire to fulfill his dream, has already made a mark at the Berlin Film Festival.

Gattu releasing in India on April 20th

TNN / Feb 27, 2012, 12:01 (IST)

The special mentioned children’s film of the 62nd Berlin film festival is ready to charm the Indian audience

A big kiddie film after 16 yrs

Mumbai Mirror / Feb 08, 2012, 10:00 (IST)

After 16 years, Children's Film Society of India (CFSI) will be releasing director Rajan Khosa's film Gattu in April. The last film CFSI released was Santosh Sivan's Halo in 1996

Anurag Kashyap signs Gattu’s child artist

TNN / Jun 19, 2012, 11:11 (IST)

Child artist Mohammad Samad who will be soon seen in the critically acclaimed film Gattu has been signed by Anurag Kashyap.

Celebs attended the premiere of the film Gattu

TNN / Jul 19, 2012, 00:00 (IST)

Bachcha party: MP Jaya Bachchan and Shashi Tharoor, along with I&B minister Ambika Soni, attended the premiere of the film Gattu in the capital recently.

Hansel Mehta's 'Shahid' to open Dharamshala film festival

PTI / Oct 30, 2012, 20:40 (IST)

Filmmaker Hansel Mehta's 'Shahid' will be the opening film at the first Dharamshala international film festival, beginning November 1.

Chinese floored by Indian films

TNN / Nov 16, 2011, 03:18 (IST)

A delegation of Chinese filmmakers might come to India to interact with their counterparts soon and learn a few tricks of the trade.

Dharamshala international film fest set to start

TNN / Oct 12, 2012, 18:01 (IST)

The first Dharamshala International Film Fest (DIIF) will be held from Nov 1-4 at Mcleodganj, Himachal Pradesh, well-known actor Kabir bedi announced in the capital on Thursday.

Nawazuddin bag awards at New York fest

TNN / May 31, 2012, 13:27 (IST)

But both the actors couldn't physically make it to the New York Indian Film Festival where they bagged the awards for their respective performances in 'Dekh Indian Circus'

Children's film festival from today

TNN / May 11, 2012, 01:58 (IST)

The Entertainment Society Of Goa (ESG) will organize a children's film festival between May 11 and 13 at Maquinez Palace, Panaji.Gattu, a film directed by Rajan Khosa will be the opening film.

Intl children's film festival off to colourful start

TNN / Nov 15, 2011, 01:21 (IST)

The seven-day children's film extravaganza took off to a colourful start here on Monday.
